Sentencas: The existing Ni cermet anodes in single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells (SC-SOFCs) usually perform poorly in hydrocarbon-air mixture owing to the reduction-oxidation cycles (redox) and latent reoxidation at operating temperatures.
Titulo: Enhanced redox and reoxidation tolerances of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 electrolyte for Ni cermet anodes in single-chamber SOFCs

Sentencas: In this study, the redox and reoxidation tolerances of Ni cermet anode, composed of Ni metal and gadolinium-doped ceria (GDC) electrolyte, are investigated and evaluated in SC-SOFC conditions.
Titulo: Enhanced redox and reoxidation tolerances of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 electrolyte for Ni cermet anodes in single-chamber SOFCs

Sentencas: The catalytic performances, resistance properties, and microstructure evolution of the Ni cermet are measured under different CH4-O-2 ratios (M) in the temperature range of 700-800 degrees C. Unlike the general perspective that the electrolyte materials are inactive for the catalytic reaction of fuel, GDC shows a superior catalytic activity for CH4 reforming, especially the complete oxidation.
Titulo: Enhanced redox and reoxidation tolerances of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 electrolyte for Ni cermet anodes in single-chamber SOFCs

Sentencas: It significantly reduces the presence of O-2 on Ni metal, resulting in an improvement of redox and reoxidation tolerance.
Titulo: Enhanced redox and reoxidation tolerances of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 electrolyte for Ni cermet anodes in single-chamber SOFCs

Sentencas: The obtained results unveil a fascinating hidden side that the electrolyte materials of SC-SOFCs play an important role in the catalytic reaction of fuel and Ni-GDC is a promising anode for SC-SOFCs.
Titulo: Enhanced redox and reoxidation tolerances of Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 electrolyte for Ni cermet anodes in single-chamber SOFCs
